Wow!  With an overwhelming selection of restaurants to choose from in this area, I looked for guidance from Lazarus at my hotel (La Méridien).  Just across the street is this gem.  Best rigatoni with fresh mozzarella, lime, and mint.   And lemon pie fir dessert (it's actually lemon chiffon).  Both totally recommended!  Plus free wifi.  And their prices are reasonable!  Good service too.  Funky ambiance with giant hanging orbs of light inside.  Outside seating too.
